generated_body: In reading the article about Selena Gomez discussing her experiences with body shaming, the user may expect to find insights into her personal struggles related to weight gain, particularly in the context of her ongoing battle with lupus. The article is likely to explore her reflections on societal pressures regarding body image and how these pressures have affected her mental health and self-acceptance. Additionally, it could provide details about her journey toward embracing her body and advocating for more inclusive discussions around health and beauty standards.
